decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A 201a, A/P 001, A/P 100, A/P 101, A/P 102a, A/P 103a, A/P 110, A/P 112a, A/P 120, A/P 122a, A/P 210, Drawing Schedule, Design & Access Statement Received: 10 June 2014 A/P 220c Received: 26 August 2014 A/P 202d, A/P 203c, A/P 212d, A/P 222d Received: 01 September 2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of rear roof extension, second floor outrigger extension over the existing rear first floor extension and the installation of three front roof lights to the house
